name: In re the ESTATE OF Daniel KREMPASKY, Deceased. Appeal of Florence KREMPASKY
name_abbreviation: In re the Estate of Krempasky

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: In re the ESTATE OF Daniel KREMPASKY, Deceased. Appeal of Florence KREMPASKY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
CASTILLE and NIGRO, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: George E. Clark, Jr., Chinchilla, for Florence Krempasky.
Gerald R. Butler, for Estate of Daniel Krempasky, Deceased.
casebody.head_matter:
720 A.2d 762

Argued Nov. 18, 1998.
Decided Dec. 14, 1998.
George E. Clark, Jr., Chinchilla, for Florence Krempasky.

Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
